posts.postText:
Rick Astley has a new single out... his first in 17 years.
Its called "Lights out"

Basically, 4chan, funnyjunk, and some other sites want to make it get a shit ton of views well...
because it's Rick fucking Astley.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rgUrqGFxV3Q

Nuff said.

Edit: Oh yeah, and I know some of you have probably heard it since it came out in June apparently, but meh.

Wow, Its acually not bad -.0
Its a bit addicting :3
And since we are on the subject:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ
